import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a Collection"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/collections/{collection-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete a collection for a game. Successful request will return `204 No Content`.

    __NOTE:__ You can perform a soft delete or a permanent delete by specifying the `permanent` boolean parameter in the request body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"The ID of the game to which the collection belongs.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"collection-id","in":"path","description":"The ID of the collection to delete.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Delete Collection Request","properties":{"permanent":{"description":"Whether to permanently delete the collection. Default is false.","type":"boolean","default":0,"example":1},"reason":{"description":"Reason for deleting the collection.","type":"string","maxLength":1000,"example":"Stolen Content"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/docs/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}}},"403":{"description":"Forbidden. The authenticated user does not have permission to delete this collection.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/docs/response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. >
  
</StatusCodes>
